<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: while (cell == null || cell.getCellType() != CellType.BLANK) {
    System.out.println("Cell value B" + rownum +  ": " + cell);
    rownum++;
    row = insheet.getRow(rownum);
    cell = row.getCell(column);
}
<<<explanation>>>: The NullPointerException occurs because the cell variable is null when you try to access its properties. To avoid this, you can add a null check before checking the cell type. Additionally, you can use the CellType.BLANK enum value instead of the integer value 3 to check for blank cells.
